Description: Ostracon, large fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is ribbed and covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of black-painted Greek characters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394196) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394196)
